projects.title: News Ai
projects.description: News AI is a groundbreaking project that harnesses the power of artificial intelligence to simplify the process of content creation and sharing. With News AI, you can easily extract and rewrite articles from RSS feeds and distribute them across multiple channels, including social media and email marketing campaigns.

projects.title: Bmw Tutorials
projects.description: BMW Tutorials is a mobile application that allows BMW owners to learn how to perform basic maintenance tasks on their vehicles. The app is built with IonicJS and uses the YouTube API, Cloudflare Workers, Firebase.
